about.title: About me
about.subtitle: I'm Laura Duhamel, alias Lau.
about.description: To expend, I’m a passionate, a motivated, a little crazy, a little boring, a little annoying, but I’m myself and I’m trying to do my best everytime. I think that perfection doesn’t exist and design help me in my life, everyday, every times

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.description: You need my services to create a flyer, a brochure, a brand identity, an illustration, a web design, for a small or bigger project ? You just need some informations ? Contact me, I would be happy to talk & work with you!
